text:
Hi there, I'm having a pretty big Issue with the conversation API. So a client is doing a lot of sales through Whatsapp and some times people autofill their old number into a form submission before enaging in whatsapp leading to a shadow contact to be created in HubSpot. Now we've found a way to set up a trigger to find the right contact but no matter what we try we aren't able to connect the conversation with the contact through the API, only through the UI's button for "Associate contact"


First we get the ID of the contact by hitting the conversatin API and then we tried to merge the 2 contacts with <https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/merge-vids/278401/> but this doesn't work as I'm guessing the shadow contact isn't recognized as a real contact

Using the associations API (to also associate the correct connect) returns a succes response but doesn't update the UI (I'm guessing thats due to the fact it can't display 2 associations)

Are there any fixes here? Is this an API issue and needs to be brought to HS engineers?
Any idea?

Hello -> Cannot find due date field in tasks object

I'm searching for the due date fields regarding HubSpot tasks.
I cannot find any related field in the tasks API.

This is the URL: <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/task>

The only related field I found is:
hs_task_missed_due_date

Thanks
can we fetch posts from jQuery as per my requirement?
No unfortunately you can’t fetch directly from the HubSpot api from the front end. So you have to setup a server less function to proxy the requests
Can you tell me how this setup will be please?
The above docs walk though it

Hello, can someone help me? I'm trying to retrieve these properties `priority`, `next_step`, and `num_of_times_contacted` from deals, but it's not bringing them. Does anyone know why? This is my endpoint:
`<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals/${idDeals}?properties=priority,next_step,num_of_times_contacted>`

I'm using laravel HubSpot: <https://github.com/rossjcooper/laravel-HubSpot> package in my laravel app
I only get these properties but I can see on Contact Information, the contact has a lot of properties and the values
code: `return HubSpot::crm()->contacts()->basicApi()->getById($contactId)`

Okay
Will we be able to then get the blog posts into webflow from the API?
yep you'll then just hit the serverless function and ask for the posts
Hey <@U04MZF2VA3H> - Curious to know how your development is going?  Im the PM at HubSpot for the Marketing Events API.

<@UD53A9UUR> sorry for the delay, just submitted a support ticket with details

the ticket number is: #13777916
Hi Edward! Did you find a workaround about this?
If you send the properties parameter you can request more properties by name
Are you sure these property names match the internal names?
I can't find the internal names, but it says they are properties of the deals that I can retrieve
Do you know where I can see them?
glad you found some helpful tools! been doing well, thanks, hope all’s well :)
ahhh, that makes sense. We’ve moved to a different solution in the meantime. Appreciate it, Eric! :)

Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY>
let me check
If I need some help, will you help me
